jobDescription: Big dreams often start small. From an idea in a London pub, we have grown into a global cloud enabler which operates across 7 countries and speak over 30 languages.  Our purpose at Cloudreach is to “enable innovation.” We do this by helping enterprise customers adopt and harness the power of cloud computing. We believe that the growth of a great business can only be fueled by great people, so join us in our partnership with AWS, Microsoft and Google and help us build one of the most disruptive companies in the cloud industry. It’s not your average job, because Cloudreach is not your average company.  As a Cloud Consultant within Cloudreach, you will help key clients define their cloud strategy and create cloud governance models. You will use your consultancy experience to drive progress with clients, which sometimes may require challenging their modus operandi. You will leverage experiences of what has worked well and not so well from other clients. You may be asked to spearhead engagements with the Cloudreach team. Our engineering and project management teams will look to you to set direction and provide mentoring. You will act as the link between the customer, the technical project team and the project/program managers, providing drive and understanding across business needs, technical implementation and organizational aspects. You will love cloud technology and stay up to date with the latest announcements and services, and then share your understanding across the company.
